subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Dwight Howard had 17 points, 14 rebounds and 5 blocks Friday night to lift the Orlando Magic to a 117-96 victory at home against the Boston Celtics.
snippet: Dwight Howard had 17 points, 14 rebounds and 5 blocks Friday night to lift the Orlando Magic to a 117-96 victory at home against the Boston Celtics.
